name: kengo ichiki @ github
body:
### Welcome to kichiki's github page.
Thanks for coming.

Now I'm migrating here in github.

For now, the contents are just as follows: 
* [my personal blog (in japanese)](diary/index.html)

***

### Author
Kengo Ichiki (@kichiki)
* fb: [kengo.ichiki](http://www.facebook.com/kengo.ichiki)
* twitter(ja): @[ichiki_k](http://twitter.com/ichiki_k)
* twitter(en): @[kengoichiki](http://twitter.com/kengoichiki)
* instagram: [ichiki_k](http://instagram.com/ichiki_k)
* Linkedin: [kengoichiki](jp.linkedin.com/in/kengoichiki/)
* arXiv: [Kengo Ichiki](http://arxiv.org/a/ichiki_k_1)
* ResearchGate: [Kengo Ichiki](https://www.researchgate.net/profile/Kengo_Ichiki/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
